TopicTitle: Just don't stop me now! - A video of some fast flying!

Articles.Content:
Valentina Kerman was bored whilst Jeb, Bill and Bob were away exploring Tylo and the rest of the Jool system. After enlisting the help of Gus Kerman, she secretly constructed an aircraft behind Mort and Gene's back, which she named Speedy.

If the boys were having fun, so should she!

Well, here's my next video. First one since It's So Classic. I think I owe you guys one by now. It was actually supposed to be "Don't Stop Me Now" with lots of missions in it but I had so much film from this one plane flight that I put this together. I really hope you guys enjoy it and if you did, stay tuned for more!

I'll post a craft file for the plane if you guys want it. It's actually really fun to fly!

Thanks guys, and I hope you enjoyed! Thanks for reading this far too.

Either something is wrong with your video or with my laptop. it is 'Just don't stop ERRR.. now' which can't be correct

By the way, am I allowed to say that thing looks really unsafe?

? Is this a serious problem? Can you not see the video?

Yes, you can say that, and let me tell you, it is very unsafe!
@superstrijder15 Is your computer overheating or something? This sometimes happens to me after putting my laptop on a blanket while watching youtube videos
